name: A Date with Mu Min
description:
UPDATE 2:

Fixed even more typos, adjusted text sizes in the menus. Thank you Main and Latte for catching these bugs!

UPDATE 1:

Added in missing sprites, fixed typos, and made tenses consistent! Thank you Leo!

A short visual novel about a girl who tries to romance her cyborg bodyguard.

This is the first project I've ever made in Ren'Py and the second visual novel I've ever made! I made this in the span of around a month as I wanted to learn Ren'py during my winter break. I hope you enjoy this short story that I wrote around my OCs :) Feel free to give constructive criticism and tell me what you thought of it!

Everything in the game was created by me. The cafe background was heavily inspired by the interior of the PeggyPorschen bakery, designed by Kinnersley Kent. The main menu font is Scholarly Ambition by nhfonts.
